name: ziqi cardigan
notes:
view pattern online now: https://en.susudiy.com/detail?id=1826801842424647682

the crocheting guidance available as following:
https://youtu.be/tg7dk37y81e

**get yarn kit now**
amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/b0dlnhrn2w?maas=maas_adg_134c95ad00defbcab5d86dd5116700dd_afap_abs&ref_=aa_maas&tag=maas
shopify: https://susudiy.myshopify.com/products/ziqi-cardigan

this cardigan is a patchwork of two hexagonal motifs, simply structured and easy to make.

sleeves and body are molded in one piece, no sewing required, save time and effort.

this cardigan is styled modern and simple to be part of the commuters' outfits.

the crocheting guidance will guide you step by step through completing this project, and we hope that during the process, you discover even more joy in the colors and stitching techniques used.

please visit our youtube channel - susan’s family to view them. you can also find us at https://www.instagram.com/susansfamily2013/

more product can be found in this account. please remember to subscribe & turn on notifications if you’d like to know immediately when there’s anew video up.
